title: 526 - YouTube’s Dr. Garth Graham on Social Media and Misinformation
itunes:title: 526 - YouTube’s Dr. Garth Graham on Social Media and Misinformation
description: Social media has long been criticized for its role in perpetuating dangerous misinformation. Dr. Garth Graham, the director and global head of healthcare and public health at Google and YouTube, talks with Dr. Josh Sharfstein about how this came to a head during the pandemic and how he sees the opportunity for social media channels to be leaders in the evolution of science and public health communications.
